tool_description: MMI is a sentiment tool that describes the current mood in the market as emotions!
name: Market Mood Index
title: Market Mood Index

api_list.name: Get Market Mood Index
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://market-mood-index.p.rapidapi.com/mmi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "market-mood-index.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://market-mood-index.p.rapidapi.com/mmi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "market-mood-index.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
